search_query: FICO Fair Isaac competitors 2005 credit scoring risk management
context: Fair Isaac Corporation is a analytics and decision management company focused on credit scoring, fraud detection, and decision optimization. Expanded analytics beyond credit scoring.

competitors.name: Equifax
competitors.notes: Credit bureau providing data to FICO while developing competing scoring models; beginning to explore creating an independent scoring alternative

competitors.name: Experian
competitors.notes: Major credit reporting agency competing in credit scoring, fraud detection, and decision management solutions

competitors.name: TransUnion
competitors.notes: Credit bureau serving as FICO partner and competitor; would soon join with other bureaus to create VantageScore in 2006

competitors.name: SAS Institute
competitors.notes: Analytics software company offering credit risk management, decision management, and fraud detection solutions to financial institutions

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Technology giant providing enterprise analytics and risk management software competing with FICO's decision management offerings

competitors.name: In-house Bank Models
competitors.notes: Large banks developing proprietary credit scoring and risk assessment models as alternatives to FICO

competitors.name: CRIF Ratings
competitors.notes: European credit bureau offering credit scoring solutions, competing primarily in international markets

competitors.name: LexisNexis Risk Solutions
competitors.notes: Data analytics provider offering fraud detection and risk assessment solutions across multiple industries including financial services

competitors.name: ChoicePoint
competitors.notes: Data aggregation and risk management company providing identity verification and fraud prevention services
